answer:
QUESTION
AoA Mufti Sahab, Is there any book written by The Great Imam-e-Azam Abu Hanifa (Nauman bin Thabi) Rehmat-ul-Lah Alai? If so please name those books. If not so please name any great book of Hanafi
ANSWER


Share:
1. According to the Shari'ah, the children of non-Muslims born through
wedlock are legitimate. That does not indicate approving their religion in
any way.
2. There are many books written on the life of Imaam Abu Hanifa. They are
available in many Kutub Khanas in Karachi, Pakistan.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
